sys_script_fix.name: Generate Terms From Import Set(remove)

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fix_3468ea251ba0099062e50ed2cd4bcbbf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Generate Terms From Import Set(remove)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var i=0;
	try {
		var importGR = new GlideRecord('x_apig_sox_record_term_list');
		importGR.addEncodedQuery('u_disposition=Remove');
		importGR.query();
		while(importGR.next()){
		var inputs = {};
		inputs['employee_email'] = importGR.getValue('u_userprincipalname'); // String 
		inputs['manager_email'] = importGR.getValue('u_manager'); // String 
		inputs['employee_full_name'] = importGR.getValue('u_displayname'); // String
		inputs['company_name'] = importGR.getValue('u_company'); // String 

sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().subflow('x_apig_sox_record.generate_term_request').inBackground().withInputs(inputs).run();	
			i++;
		}
		gs.error("Terminations Run: " + i);
	} catch (ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
		gs.error("Creating Terminations Failed: " + message);
		gs.error("Terminations Run Before Failure: " + i);
	}
	
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-12-20 20:21:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3468ea251ba0099062e50ed2cd4bcbbf</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Generate Terms From Import Set(remove)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="SOx Record Generators" source="x_apig_sox_record">24586a251ba0099062e50ed2cd4bcbfc</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="SOx Record Generators">24586a251ba0099062e50ed2cd4bcbfc</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3468ea251ba0099062e50ed2cd4bcbbf</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-12-27 14:28:22</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
